sentences: Aega ei tohi raisata, kaotada, asjatult kulutada.
Ta raisas oma kogu elu aega mõtlematelt tegudelt.
context: The Estonian verb 'raisata' means to waste or squander time. It is used when someone uses their time unproductively, carelessly, or without purpose. The word appears in contexts advising against wasting valuable time and emphasizes the importance of using time wisely rather than throwing it away on trivial matters.
